Name: Robot Room Cleaner
About the game: Robot Room Cleaner is the premier robot vacuum simulator game The most satisfying game Watch as the floor becomes clean in real-time as you control your robot vacuum to clean the entire room. Clean everything Vacuum up dust, crumbs and more while avoiding furniture, pets and other obstacles. Plan your cleaning routes carefully. Be sure to return to base stations to recharge before your robot runs out of battery, or fills up to capacity. Maximize efficiency and clean each room as quickly as possible, or vacuum at your own pace, the choice is yours. Clean rooms successfully to earn credits to unlock more robots, with different stats. Some are faster, some have higher capacities and battery lives. You'll find different robots are better suited for different rooms and different play styles. Features • Actual real time floor cleaning mechanics • Relaxing, satisfying and calming gameplay • Multiple levels • Multiple robot vacuums to unlock • Pets and other obstacles to avoid • Complete challenges to unlock new robot vacuums • Easy to use controls, simply use your keyboard or a gamepad to control your robot • Rebindable keys
